title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Crucifixion, Study after Ludovica Carracci", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Christ on Cross, great mass of seemingly nude figures at lower third of sheet; bearded male figure holds knife. God the Father at upper left with weeping angel below him; at upper right are two angels. Above Christ's head is plaque, and two tombstones at lower left have simulated inscriptions.
